RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 6 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (O hio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIDNIGHT J J sped to the front, surrounded far turn from inside, dug in gamely through the stretch run to prevail in game fashion. WHERE'D THE DAY GO chased winner to far turn, menaced past quarter pole, outgamed. SHAKEM N BREAKEM never far back to far turn, three wide bid stretch flattened out. TORNADO BOY inside trip to far turn with no late kick in the stretch run.

ENTRY.NAME: Tornado Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip to far turn with no late kick in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Shakem N Breakem
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back to far turn, three wide bid stretch flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight J J
ENTRY.OWNER: Sweet Carolina Racing and Bourbon LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: sped to the front, surrounded far turn from inside, dug in gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Where'd the Day Go
ENTRY.OWNER: Donovitch Kevin W Rodriguez Eduardo M and Joy Kyle S
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner to far turn, menaced past quarter pole, outgamed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 40. Maiden Special Weight Purse 23700. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EMERALD EYES sharp from the gate outside, three wide duel to turn, drove clear. SISSY'S MAY broke tardy from gate, raced back to the turn no match late. BREATH OF HEAVEN chased between horses to the turn, could not keep up. PEARL PEARL PEARL raced along evenly with no late kick when needed in the stretch. MOTOWN HARBOR never menaced throughout from inside to the turn. MISS SOLAN rail trip to the stretch, shuffled back past quarter pole, faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Motown Harbor
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced throughout from inside to the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Pearl Pearl Pearl
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no late kick when needed in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Solan
ENTRY.COMMENT: rail trip to the stretch, shuffled back past quarter pole, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Breath of Heaven
ENTRY.OWNER: Borchetta Mike Borchetta Martha and Borchetta Scott
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased between horses to the turn, could not keep up

ENTRY.NAME: Sissy's May
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke tardy from gate, raced back to the turn no match late

ENTRY.NAME: Emerald Eyes
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp from the gate outside, three wide duel to turn, drove clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 6, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).

CLAIM.OWNER: Adams James M and Cox Christopher J

RACE.FOOTNOTES: FAST FELIX with leader to turn, roused to go well clear handily to the wire. HECTOR B outside run to the stretch while no match to the wire for place. PASION AZTECA no speed from the gate, rallied along in earnest for place spot. KOBE BEACH trailed to the stretch while well back with no real late gain. KING OF TRUTH inside speed to the stretch but could keep up in the stretch. FLOYD G had an awkward start from the gate, tried to keep up to the turn while out of gas and faded back.

ENTRY.NAME: Floyd G
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke awkward from the gate, rushed inside to turn, emptied out

ENTRY.NAME: Pasion Azteca
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed from the gate, rallied along in earnest for place spot

ENTRY.NAME: King of Truth
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the stretch but could keep up in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Felix
ENTRY.COMMENT: with leader to turn, roused to go well clear handily to the wire

ENTRY.NAME: Kobe Beach
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed to the stretch while well back with no real late gain

ENTRY.NAME: Hector B
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside run to the stretch while no match to the wire for place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 1 1/16M Turf CR: 85. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 17800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Rac es At A Mile Or Over Since August 6, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not St arted For Less Than $15,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and a Sixteenth.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DICHOTOMY quickly to the front with patient handling to stretch, held sway under good handling to the wire while ridden out. PARFAIT inside run to far turn, could not handle winner in the stretch. ADDISON chasing to pair throughout, no late kick in the stretch run. TRICK HAT raced along evenly from inside throughout with no response. LADY JENNEVIERE trailed the field to far turn, passed a couple late. EARLY BLOOMER brief speed to first turn but backed up into far turn and stretch. LEDGENDARY KITTEN never factored throughout. RACE HAD TO BE HAND TIMED.

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Jenneviere
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed the field to far turn, passed a couple late

ENTRY.NAME: Dichotomy
ENTRY.COMMENT: quickly to the front with patient handling to stretch, held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Parfait
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside run to far turn, could not handle winner in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Ledgendary Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: never factored throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Trick Hat
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly from inside throughout with no response

ENTRY.NAME: Addison
ENTRY.COMMENT: chasing to pair throughout, no late kick in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Early Bloomer
ENTRY.OWNER: JK Stable LLC and Barker Scott W
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed to first turn but backed up into far turn and stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 68. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16200. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TALKSCHEAP chased leader to the turn, ran past under stout handling, clear. ROCKY'S EXPRESS chasing top pair to the stretch, ran on from off rail for place. BOBBY MERLOT no speed to the turn, rallied along in earnest for show spot. LIAMS LAD off rail trip while evenly throughout with no response late. FORTUNE never menaced throughout. OUTSLEWTHEM outside speed to the turn, could not keep up in the stretch. ELEGGUA always trailed while far back in the stretch.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 54. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16200. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 121 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CLASSIC JULIA three way duel early on between horses, cleared turn drifting out. KACHOW brief duel, took up the chase to no avail settled for place spot. CANOPY between horses early, backed off while evenly throughout. DESPEIGHTFUL rushed inside with speed to the turn, gave way readily. GO MUNECA broke awful from the gate and never close throughout.

ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed inside with speed to the turn, gave way readily

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 23200. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since August 6 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Claiming Races For $16,000 Or Less Not Consider ed In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STARTDFROMDABOTTOM quick from gate, outsprinted quickly, regrouped took over easily. THE PINK Z trailed to the stretch with a outside run for place. THEDAYOFTHEGREY had a poor start from the gate, chased to turn, empty. UPGRADE AL inside speed to the front, overtaken into turn, gave in readily. OL' NED stumbled badly from the gate unseating rider.. DUE TO LOOSE HORSE, FRACTIONS ADDED FOLLOWING REVIEW.

ENTRY.NAME: Ol' Ned
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled badly from the gate unseating rider, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Upgrade Al
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the front, overtaken into turn, gave in readily

ENTRY.NAME: Thedayofthegrey
ENTRY.OWNER: Cline Robert C and Wilkinson Richard M
ENTRY.COMMENT: had a poor start from the gate, chased to turn, empty

ENTRY.NAME: The Pink Z
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed to the stretch with a outside run for place

ENTRY.NAME: Startdfromdabottom
ENTRY.OWNER: Marc Wampler Marc and Shoemaker Jared
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick from gate, outsprinted quickly, regrouped took over easily

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 1 1/16M Turf CR: 85. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16200. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this ra ce will be run at One Mile and a Sixteenth.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOPPY chased pace to far turn, angled out past the quarter pole for clear run, rallied along strongly to clear under perfect handling to the wire. Q BOND inside position to far turn, angled out into stretch while gaining strongly once again for the place spot while no match for the winner. RED TIARA loped along inside with the lead to deep stretch stayed on well in a game effort but was outkicked late while keeping the show spot in a good effort. MUCHA snuck down to the rail into first turn, raced along evenly while saving all the ground to the far turn with no late bid when needed in the stretch run. ORCHARD ROAD chased off rail to far turn while not far back but came up empty in the stretch run. IMAGE OF LOVE raced behind a wall of horses into and around first turn, between horses far turn but came up empty from the quarter pole. CROWN OF FAVOR endured strong kick back into first turn, never untracked from that point. PLEASANT SKY angled in quickly to first turn, saved ground to no avail.

ENTRY.NAME: Red Tiara
ENTRY.COMMENT: loped along inside with the lead to deep stretch, outkicked late

ENTRY.NAME: Q Bond
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside position to far turn, angled out into stretch, gaining

ENTRY.NAME: Mucha
ENTRY.OWNER: Claiborne Farm and Dilschneider, Adele B.
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no late bid when needed in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Boppy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace to far turn, rallied along strongly to clear

ENTRY.NAME: Image of Love
ENTRY.OWNER: Low, Lawana L. and Robert E.
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind wall of horses first turn, between horses far turn, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Pleasant Sky
ENTRY.COMMENT: bounced around at the start, angled in while never a threat

ENTRY.NAME: Orchard Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased off rail to far turn, came up empty in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Crown of Favor
ENTRY.COMMENT: strong kick back into first turn, never untracked from that point
